abstract: With even established hedge funds having trouble these days, investing in untested ones is not for the faint of heart. Could that be why JPMorgan Chase is reportedly seeking to sell a unit that provides hedge funds with seed capital?
lead_paragraph: With even established hedge funds having trouble these days, investing in untested ones is not for the faint of heart. Could that be why JPMorgan Chase is reportedly seeking to sell a unit that provides hedge funds with seed capital?

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Shop Fund Incubator
